sense.def: have no respect for the value of
[GET DOWN>] get down one's throat, swallow

bibl.title: 簡明古漢語同義詞詞典
簡明古漢語同義詞詞典

entry.def: Xià 下 is a neutral technical term for giving up fighting in a military context.

sense.def: send down from (Heaven) above; issue from above (and order); promulgate from above (an ordinance or law)
hand (N2) down to (a recipient N1); pass over (a memorial N2) to (an official N1 for appraisal);

entry.def: Xià 下 is used in elevated court language to refer to subjects.

sense.def: subordinates, (public) servants; those below, the subjects; people of low status
the subjects of the contextually determinate N

humble oneself before> show reverence to 下人"(as a superior) treat others with respect" to treat with humility, treat deferentially (persons whom one is not obliged to treat that way); mix congenially with (those who are of lower status)
at a lowly and simple level, not 上 "on a high level"
make an official decision on a matter and send it down for implementation
set up below; put down below, put (brush) to paper

entry.def: Proximity to a city can be expressed by the "postposiiton" xià 下.

sense.def: the vicinity; near (a city); in front of (a tent etc)

entry.def: Xià 下 (ant. shàng 上 "ascend") sometimes refers colourlessly to something moving downwards.

sense.def: go down; move down; flow downwards
go down to the contextually determinate place to V
go down, get down (from a contextually determinate place); dismount from a carriage
let somebody or something descend, cause something to come down; cause someone to dismount
what is low, the low parts
one should not go about V-ing NB: It is quite possible that the syntactic category here should be VPt[0]+V[0].

entry.def: Xià 下 (ant. shàng 上 "superior") is a colourless general way of referring to something being inferior to something else (which may or may not be specified) in any sense. [GRADED]

sense.def: of lower quality, of the lower kind; inferior
on an inferior level of culture
be of inferior quality, be of a lower kind; be inferior; be of inferior moral mettle
under the influence of> because of

entry.def: Xià 下 refers to low status in absolute terms.

sense.def: subordinates; those who are of lower rank; inferiors
of low rank; very low in rank; lower in rank, subordinate
among the humble people; at the more inferior level, addressing those below one's own status
cause to be lower than (someone) in status; demote
and on the other hand (上 ...下 ... "on the one hand... on the other hand")
(so and so many) times (Note Hanshu 三下？)

entry.def: The standard term referring to the relatively low position of something vis-a-vis something else is xià 下 (ant. shàng 上 "above"). [GENERAL]; [[COMMON]]

sense.def: take the lower position, maintain the lower position, stay below something else
put (oneself) lower then N, maintain lower status in respect to N
what is low in the terrain; what is below one
low position; lowness of musical pitch
lower > inferior; of the lower world; nether; under one's command
at the lower levels; to the worse side
fig. below of N (e.g. > among the disciples of N)
the lower part; the place below something; low-lying place; the area at the foot of (a mountain)
below; at the bottom of something; in status: lower
directional verbal complement: to V in downwards direction
the place above the contextually determinate N
at the lower level; at least 上...下
be below N, be not as tall as N
to get (i.e. in one's speech) below the standard N, to go further down below N
at least, in the least elevated level; towards the inferior levels of the society
